{"id":1080992012,"question_id":3186,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1697942640,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1080992012/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Sum of Mountain Triplets II","memory":"60.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimumSum(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        \n        int sum = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        \n        int[] leftmin = new int[len];\n        leftmin[0] = nums[0];\n        for(int i=1; i<len; i++){\n            leftmin[i] = Math.min(leftmin[i-1], nums[i]);   \n            // System.out.print(leftmin[i]+\",\");\n        }\n         // System.out.println();\n        \n        int[] rightmin = new int[len];\n        rightmin[len-1] = nums[len-1];\n        for(int i=len-2; i>=0; i--){\n            rightmin[i] = Math.min(rightmin[i+1], nums[i]);  \n            // System.out.print(rightmin[i]+\",\");\n        }\n        \n         // System.out.println();\n        \n        \n        int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        for(int i=1; i<len-1; i++){\n            if(leftmin[i-1]<nums[i] && nums[i]>rightmin[i+1]){\n                min = Math.min(min, leftmin[i-1]+nums[i]+rightmin[i+1]);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return min==Integer.MAX_VALUE ? -1: min;\n        \n    }\n               \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-sum-of-mountain-triplets-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
